name: Monthly Open Mic Night
description:
Basically we just organize Open Mic Nights on a monthly basis, the more metaverse the betterverse. Contribute, enjoy, & onboard artists to web 3. 

Join our Keybase Community and Vote on Artists and Staff for our Online Monthly Open Mic Nights here https://keybase.io/team/openmicnightdao

You must have a browser extension that can resolve Decentralized DNSs to view our Unstoppable Domain, https://OpenMicNight.dao

Our Charter that will describe our governance and operations is buidled on https://bip.so/@openmicnightsocialdao/about

Our Proposals will be drafted and voted on here https://snapshot.org/#/ernestofgaia.eth

Our Governance Token on Polygon https://polygonscan.com/token/0xF4C528542137030d85B09f06D93668c6218b18F6

Earn one Governance Token for voting, being elected as staff, and for getting a spot in a line up.

Budget Workbook Here for payouts to staff and artists
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FG8Y2WYQru2Ji6qn20ApiqAoDiXz29hfa7TUXH6z8rk/edit?usp=sharing
payDisclosure:
